title: After demons and death gods, ‘Warcraft’ gets sunny with ‘Dragonflight’
description: In an interview, two "World of Warcraft" developers talk fan expectations and controversial plot beats — and drop hints about the future of cross-faction play.

title: Elon Musk says Apple threatened to remove Twitter from App Store
description: Removal of Twitter from the App Store would make the social media platform unavailable to new users with Apple devices.

title: How to tell real products from scams when shopping online
description: It’s hard to tell what’s quality or a scam online. Use these research skills to avoid getting duped.

title: High-profile Republicans gain followers in first weeks of Musk’s reign
description: Sens. Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders have lost tens of thousands of followers, while Republicans such as Sen. Ted Cruz and Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene have seen big increases.
